title: Kamalas Coconuts
description: A drinks/snacks simulator, and a parody of politics.

title: My Grandfathers Secret
description: Help Ricky uncover family secrets in this heartfelt point-and-click game made for the GitHub Game Off 2024.

title: Rats Reckoning
description: A short and fun point-and-click game that packs a punch.

title: Bat out of Hell
description: Welcome to Hell. The only way out is to earn your way out, so start collecting.

title: FishyFishy
description: You have two minutes to eat as many fish as possible, eating the wrong fish will end the game.
